summary: AN ORDINANCE amending subsections D, E and F of SMC 4.08.040, relating to the Public Safety Civil Service Commission, and subsections D, E and F of SMC 4.04.050 relating to the Civil Services Commission, changing the date of the election of the employee-selected commissioners from the first week in December to the first week in November and fixing the date of runoff elections as the first week in December.
